short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Companion extension for Generic TFT Overlay on Overwolf.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Generic TFT Overlay Extension is a companion app for Generic TFT Overlay on the Overwolf app store. This app specifically adds a functionality to tactics.tools which allows data provided from the overlay to automatically open pages and contextual links on the site.

Below is a description of the Generic TFT Overlay on the overwolf app store.

Generic TFT Overlay is an app that aims to provide TFT players with a number of quick-reference tools to improve the general gameplay experience.

The overlay has 5 Main Features -

Stats:
The Stats tab allows one to select from a number of filters and will open a url to a tab with these filters passed in as an href. 
(An accompanying chrome extension has been developed to translate these filters into tab actions, Generic TFT Overlay Extension on the chrome extension store)

Alerts:
The Alerts tab allows one to set up a number of alerts that will automatically appear in the alert notifications window upon various conditions becoming active during gameplay.

History:
The History tab allows one to view at a glance the combat history of the other players in the lobby.

Bookmarks:
The Bookmarks tab allows one to create a number of links related to commonly looked up game functions.

Settings:
The Settings tab allows one to change a number of settings which determine how the app works.

This Application is planned to be open sourced to allow for community development.
